title: Hong Kong democracy champion Jimmy Lai sentenced to 20 years in prison
summary_full: The heavy sentence for the 78-year-old Apple Daily founder and British citizen was imposed as Beijing seeks to wipe out the city’s remaining press freedoms.
summary_public: The heavy sentence for the 78-year-old Apple Daily founder and British citizen was imposed as Beijing seeks to wipe out the city’s remaining press freedoms.

GB.label: negative
GB.evidence: heavy sentence for the 78-year-old Apple Daily founder and British citizen
